text: Vony upholders brekhni, ta eaters nezakonnoho zarobitku. Yakshcho vony prybuvayutʹ do vas pryymaty rishennya sered nykh, vy mozhete pryymaty rishennya sered nykh, abo vy mozhete disregard yim. Yakshcho vy vybyrayete disregard yim, vony ne mozhutʹ zavdaty shkody vam u naymenshym. Ale yakshcho vy sudyte sered nykh, vy budete pryymaty rishennya equitably. BOH lyubytʹ tsi khto ye rivnopravnyy
